body_html: @martinwicke Right, I'm assuming the docstring is meant to explain how the functionality works, in which case expanding out the full functionality makes it clearer. As someone who didn't fully understand what arg_scope does (and possibly still doesn't), I found the existing docstring to be very unhelpful for figuring it out.
